item.title: other blogs

item.title: so I wrote a web server
item.description: UPDATE 2020: This post is no longer accurate since I moved my website from Digital Ocean to Github Pages. (this is actually how I ran my site in 2017 though) So I wrote a web server… … and you’re using it right now! But wait, what is it exactly? Well, think of it like an nginx of sorts. I named it plexer because I wanted to experiment with multiplexing sockets, and it’s written in one of my favorite languages, C.

Experience Currently GIPHY Senior Software Engineer, 2017-present (Aquired by Facebook) Previously Slash Keyboard Software Engineer, 2016-2017 (Aquired by GIPHY) The Glass Files Software Engineer, 2015-2016 Recurse Center Alum, 2015 (fall 2 batch)
